Pre-specified analysis perform among patient subpopulation accord level glycemic control ( HbA1c level < 6.5 % > 6.5 % ) ; reference vessel diameter quantitative coronary angiography ( < 2.5 mm > 2.5 mm ) ; stented length ( 8-18 mm ; 23-33 mm ; > 33 mm ) . The registry conduct 45 center China , CYPHER Select™+ Sirolimus-eluting Coronary Stent commercially available .
